channel.title: Recording to SDRAM with a trigger
channel.description: Hi all, I have a patch idea where I record the audio input to SDRAM, but only when a key is held down. If you press a new key, recording resumes. If you press an old key, the portion of audio that was recorded for that key is played back. The problem is, none of the delay objects have any trigger inputs. Is there some community object that will let me do this?

...it does actually start recording,but when the previous key is still on hold,

which is not what I was after, but it works...and it's 'cleaner' than the versions before..
